mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_main ps LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm ON ps.CODE=pm.CODE AND ps.stateid = '0' AND pm.stateid = '1' WHERE ps.LASTFLAG = '1' AND ps.FAMILYNEW = '1' and pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and ps.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and ps.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and pm.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_main ps LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm ON ps.CODE=pm.CODE AND ps.stateid = '0' AND pm.stateid = '1' WHERE ps.LASTFLAG = '1' AND FAMILYNEW is null and ps.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and ps.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_main where status='1' AND stateid = '1' and MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_main ps LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_main_org pg ON ps.CODE=pg.CODE AND ps.stateid = '0' AND pg.stateid = '1' LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm ON ps.CODE=pm.CODE AND ps.stateid = '0' AND pm.stateid = '1' WHERE ps.guide3 is not null and pg.SIGNCODE = '1' and ps.LASTFLAG = '1' and ps.STATEID = '0' and ps.STATUS = '1' and ps.SIGNPERIODFROM >= #{startTime}+0 and ps.SIGNPERIODFROM < #{endTime}+0 and pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_main_org pg LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm ON pg.CODE=pm.CODE AND pg.stateid = '1' AND pm.stateid = '1' WHERE pg.signcode='1' and pg.SIGNFROM >= #{startTime}+0 and pg.SIGNFROM < #{endTime}+0 and pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT o.IDNUMBER idCard FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_main_org o where o.signcode ='1' and o.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and o.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and o.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and o.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = #{unitId} group by o.IDNUMBER

SELECT o.IDNUMBER idCard FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_main_org o where o.signcode ='1' and o.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and o.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and o.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and o.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

select count(1) from phis_webhis.v_opr_register r where r.REGDATE >= #{startTime}+0 and r.REGDATE < #{endTime}+0 and r.idcardno in
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(1) from RegisterRecord where REC_DT >= #{startTime}+0 and REC_DT < #{endTime}+0 and cardno in
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select m.CENTERDOCTORNAME name from phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_main_org o left join phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_main m on o.CODE=m.CODE where m.CENTERDOCTORNAME is not null and o.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and m.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and m.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and o.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(pg.code) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_main_org pg, phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm where pg.CODE = pm.CODE AND pg.stateid = '1' AND pm.stateid = '1' and pm.STATUS = '1' and pg.signcode = '1' and pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and (pm.LINKB is not null or pm.LINKD is not null or pm.LINKHEART is not null or pm.LINKBRAIN is not null) and pg.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and pg.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and pm.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

select count(pv.CHID) as count from phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_main_org pg, phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_visit pv, phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm where pg.CODE = pm.CODE AND pg.stateid = '1' AND pm.stateid = '1' AND pg.CODE = pv.CODE AND pg.stateid = '1' AND pv.stateid = '0' and pg.SIGNCODE = '1' and pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and (pm.LINKB is not null or pm.LINKD is not null or pm.LINKHEART is not null or pm.LINKBRAIN is not null) and pg.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and pg.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and pm.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_visit pv LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm ON pv.CODE=pm.CODE AND pv.stateid = '0' AND pm.stateid = '1' AND pv.STATUS='1' AND pm.STATUS='1' WHERE pv.servercode='3' and pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and pv.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and pv.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and pm.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_visit pv LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm ON pv.CODE=pm.CODE AND pv.stateid = '0' AND pm.stateid = '1' WHERE pv.guide2 IS NOT NULL and pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and pv.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and pv.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and pm.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_visit pv LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm ON pv.CODE=pm.CODE AND pv.stateid = '0' AND pm.stateid = '1' WHERE pv.guide5 IS NOT NULL and pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and pv.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and pv.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and pm.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_main t join phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_visit_temp e on t.code = e.code where e.STATEID = '0' and t.STATUS = '1' AND t.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and t.stateid = '1' and e.ccffw IS NOT NULL and e.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and e.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and t.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_main WHERE linkcsum IS NOT NULL AND stateid = '1' AND MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' AND CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 AND CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 AND MANAGEDCENTERCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_visit_temp pt LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm ON pt.CODE=pm.CODE AND pt.stateid = '0' AND pm.stateid = '1' and pt.STATUS='1' and pm.status='1' WHERE pt.znxgjbsc IS NOT NULL and pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and pt.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and pt.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and pm.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_visit_temp pt LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm ON pt.CODE=pm.CODE AND pt.stateid = '0' AND pm.stateid = '1' and pt.STATUS='1' and pm.status='1' WHERE pt.zlsc IS NOT NULL and pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and pt.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and pt.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and pm.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_visit_temp pt LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm ON pt.CODE=pm.CODE AND pt.stateid = '0' AND pm.stateid = '1' and pt.STATUS='1' and pm.status='1' WHERE pt.gzsc IS NOT NULL and pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and pt.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and pt.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and pm.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_visit_temp pt LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm ON pt.CODE=pm.CODE AND pt.stateid = '0' AND pm.stateid = '1' and pt.STATUS='1' and pm.status='1' WHERE pt.mzfsc IS NOT NULL and pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and pt.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and pt.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and pm.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_visit_temp pt LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm ON pt.CODE=pm.CODE AND pt.stateid = '0' AND pm.stateid = '1' and pt.STATUS='1' and pm.status='1' WHERE pt.etxc IS NOT NULL and pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and pt.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and pt.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and pm.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_visit_temp pt LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm ON pt.CODE=pm.CODE AND pt.stateid = '0' AND pm.stateid = '1' and pt.STATUS='1' and pm.status='1' WHERE pt.JKZDPG IS NOT NULL and pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and pt.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and pt.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and pm.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_visit_temp pt LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm ON pt.CODE=pm.CODE AND pt.stateid = '0' AND pm.stateid = '1' and pt.STATUS='1' and pm.status='1' WHERE pt.cdss IS NOT NULL and pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and pt.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and pt.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and pm.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_visit_temp pt LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm ON pt.CODE=pm.CODE AND pt.stateid = '0' AND pm.stateid = '1' and pt.STATUS='1' and pm.status='1' WHERE pt.wx IS NOT NULL and pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and pt.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and pt.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and pm.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_main psm LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main pm ON psm.CODE=pm.CODE AND psm.stateid = '1' AND pm.stateid = '1' WHERE pm.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and psm.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and psm.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and pm.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_main a LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main b ON a.code = b.code AND b.stateid = '1' WHERE a.signmemtype LIKE '%B%' AND a.STATUS = '1' AND a.stateid = '0' AND a.LASTFLAG = '1' AND b.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and a.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and a.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and b.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_main a LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main b ON a.code = b.code AND b.stateid = '1' WHERE a.signmemtype LIKE '%5%' AND a.STATUS = '1' AND a.stateid = '0' AND a.LASTFLAG = '1' AND b.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and a.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and a.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and b.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_main a LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main b ON a.code = b.code AND b.stateid = '1' WHERE a.signmemtype LIKE '%6%' AND a.STATUS = '1' AND a.stateid = '0' AND a.LASTFLAG = '1' AND b.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and a.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and a.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and b.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_main a LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main b ON a.code = b.code AND b.stateid = '1' WHERE a.signmemtype LIKE '%E%' AND a.STATUS = '1' AND a.stateid = '0' AND a.LASTFLAG = '1' AND b.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and a.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and a.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and b.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_main a LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main b ON a.code = b.code AND b.stateid = '1' WHERE a.signmemtype LIKE '%F%' AND a.STATUS = '1' AND a.stateid = '0' AND a.LASTFLAG = '1' AND b.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and a.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and a.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and b.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_main a LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main b ON a.code = b.code AND b.stateid = '1' WHERE a.signmemtype LIKE '%7%' AND a.STATUS = '1' AND a.stateid = '0' AND a.LASTFLAG = '1' AND b.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and a.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and a.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and b.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_main a LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main b ON a.code = b.code AND b.stateid = '1' WHERE a.signmemtype LIKE '%8%' AND a.STATUS = '1' AND a.stateid = '0' AND a.LASTFLAG = '1' AND b.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and a.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and a.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and b.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_main a LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main b ON a.code = b.code AND b.stateid = '1' WHERE a.signmemtype LIKE '%D%' AND a.STATUS = '1' AND a.stateid = '0' AND a.LASTFLAG = '1' AND b.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and a.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and a.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and b.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT count(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_main m LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main b ON m.CODE=b.CODE AND b.stateid = '1' LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_pre_scale_assess a ON m.CODE=a.CODE WHERE m.STATUS = '1' AND m.stateid = '0' AND m.LASTFLAG = '1' AND b.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE is NOT null AND b.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' AND a.RISKDESC is NOT null and m.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and m.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and b.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_main a LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main b ON a.code = b.code AND b.stateid = '1' WHERE a.signmemtype LIKE '%G%' AND a.STATUS = '1' AND a.stateid = '0' AND a.LASTFLAG = '1' AND b.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and a.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and a.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and b.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM phis_chss.v_fha_person_sign_main a LEFT JOIN phis_chss.v_fha_person_main b ON a.code = b.code AND b.stateid = '1' WHERE a.signmemtype LIKE '%9%' AND a.STATUS = '1' AND a.stateid = '0' AND a.LASTFLAG = '1' AND b.MANAGEDCENTERCODE = '320583103100' and a.CREATEDTIME >= #{startTime}+0 and a.CREATEDTIME < #{endTime}+0 and b.MANAGEDSTATIONCODE = #{unitId}
